title: 14-Year Multi-Project Relationship
summary: Ongoing work from 2000-2014: master bedroom, full kitchen remodel (rewiring/re-plumbing), elevator installation (structural changes), bath remodels with accessibility/radiant heat, plus repairs/upgrades. All in-residence. houzz​
outcome: Excellent supervision by Matt Vuyovich, meticulous cleanups, fixed costs unless client changes; one project early for holiday party; treated with respect. houzz​
